name: Clineo Garcia
title: Budtender
coverLetter: I am 18 years old, and I have only had one previous delivering job. I have a car with registration, my license and insurance. I would fit perfect for this job because, between me and whoever is reading this. I have a pretty good amount of experience when it comes to MMJ. Yes I have sold it since I do obviously smoke MMJ and everyone around me smokes daily so I would supply a lot of people. small hustle but not really looking to getting into any other drugs and that business. It isn’t for me. You’re probably thinking this kid is barely 18 could i trust him well enough to leave him alone in a room with a but load of weed. you aren’t wrong, that’s how it’s supposed to be you got to find the right person that fits perfect but because of that. all i ask is for you to give me a chance, and believe me i won’t disappoint you.
